snippet: Diplomats in Istanbul for the first talks with Iran in more than a year suggested an agreement by Tehran to let inspectors visit all its nuclear sites could open the way to more negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Diplomats in Istanbul for the first talks with Iran in more than a year suggested an agreement by Tehran to let inspectors visit all its nuclear sites could open the way to more negotiations.

headline.seo: Iran Resumes Talks Over Its Nuclear Program
headline.main: As Nuclear Talks With Iran Restart, New Hopes for Deal
headline.print_headline: Iran Resumes Talks Over Its Nuclear Program
